nodes.text: Chal Hudda was a marsh-covered planet of the Outer Rim Territories that had a soupy green atmosphere. Because its natural resources held use for almost no life-forms except the native Chalhuddans, that world was of interest to virtually no one else. In 3 BBY, Princess Leia Organa of Alderaan traveled to Chal Hudda on a mercy mission.
Chal Hudda first appeared in Leia, Princess of Alderaan, a 2017 young-adult novel written by Claudia Gray that was released as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Last Jedi publishing program.
